name: W Stowers
text: First time at a Mellow Mushroom was a great experience!! Great helpful service. Unique looking restaurant in a very nice downtown area. Huge playground in a very short walking distance from the resturant. Easily accessible before or after dinner for kids. Pizza was great could be the best I've had. Highly recommend giving this a try.

name: Sam Kissinger
text: Excellent quality + they deliver to the bars nearby their location downtown. We drank at the Pub while we waited for the pizza. Such a nice experience when you donâ€™t want to jump around. Would do again

name: Bill O'Neal
text: Best atmosphere of any pizza place I've ever been. The crust was very good , but the pizza was lacking something....can't put my finger on it , but I just can't give it 5 stars.

name: Cole Wonders
text: The pizza was okay but pretty bland compared to what I was expecting. We went on a Thursday afternoon and it was not busy at all, yet we failed to get our appetizer and waited almost 45 minutes to get our pizza. Definitely not a place I would travel out of my way to go to.

name: Jerome Blandford
text: Wonderful food and great service! Next tim you are in try the buffalo pizza. Have them hold the ranch and blue cheese and add beer cheese. Thank me later!

name: Deidra Werking
text: My first time here and we had an awesome experience. The manager thanked us for helping another family and our waiter was amazing! JOHN you are awesome.  The food was also mind blowing. It is my #1 fav place!  Next time I'll get a t-shirt <3 and more amazing food and hopefully John will be there too. Thank you!

name: Sherry Blankenship
text: This was a WONDERFUL place to EAT!! FANTASTIC service, DELICIOUS food and an AESTHETICALLY PLEASING restaurant!! I had no idea we had one SO CLOSE to us!

name: Matt Basham
text: What can I say its Mellow Mushroom its always good. This location is right by Smothers park and its a great location for a date night. Could use a little more of the traditional psychedelic art work I am accustomed to seeing at other locations. They do have a real nice bar, friendly staff and its super clean.

name: mickey stocker
text: Came to Owensboro to visit my sister, and we ended up eating at the Mellow Mushroom. I highly recommend this place, and the waiter with the long beard. He and the pizza were the absolute best. When I visit me sister again I'm definitely going back to the Mellow Mushroom!!!!

name: jennifer connell
text: This place is amazing! Food was spot on and amazing. Skyler is the bartender and he rose to the challenge today. Hubby had 2 drinks he wanted that weren't on the menu here and Skyler didn't disappoint. You need to ask for the Kentucky â€¦More

name: Charles Coughlin
text: Great food. There pretzel bites with  beer cheese is fantastic. It's the best calazone I have ever had.

name: Debra Wheeler
text: Excellent customer service!! Fantastic pizza! First time ordering and although it was close to quitting time they were generous with getting our delicious pizza ready quickly and giving of their time so we could walk down from our hotel and â€¦More

name: Brandon Strange
text:
Easily the best pizza in town.
Amazing service! Especially from JM, Summer, Lindsey, Skyler, Cherokee, and Brandon. Probably the friendliest staff in town ðŸ™‚

name: Zeke Rivera
text: Pretty good pizza. Only complaint is more personal taste but they could be a little easier on the onions on some of their pies.

name: Patrick Atcher
text: The food was great and our server was on point. I can't wait to go back.

name: Elizabeth Stocker
text: If you haven't been you should go. The atmosphere is great and the people are super friendly. The food was absolutely amazing too.

name: Courtney Marvel
text: Best pizza EVER. We tried 3 different ones - all three fantastic! They hooked us up with everything we needed to have a pizza picnic at the river.

name: Joe Gardner
text: Excellent selection of whiskey service was great there gluten free pizzas we're amazing

name: Darrin Jenkins
text: Our server was the best. He had a great personality. Food was delicious. It was nice to have a great dining experience for a change

name: Heather Middlebrook
text: The taste of the pizza was out of this world!! ðŸ‘ŒðŸ¼ The staff went above and beyond to make sure our dining experience was lovely.

name: Nancy Wright
text: good service had to wait long time out side and then had to eat out side in the hot

name: Hailey Brothers
text: Waiter was super friendly and very attentive and the food was absolutely amazing. I definitely recommend.

name: William Burbine
text: Wonderful service and great food. Thanks Ian for being such a great server. And thanks for the great recommendation on the different types of beer. I recommend that you give this place a try if you are in the area. And you can ask for thin crust pizza if you like.

name: Gifford Morris
text: Friendly staff, great food, and awesome draft beer list at this beautiful downtown location in a historic building.

name: Tc White
text: I can say I've tried it several times and its pretty good but for the price and how good it is there are other places that best it by a long shot

name: Danielle Sanchez
text: Always tasty food! Great service!

name: Tracey Staples
text: My favorite restaurant and place to eat in Owensboro! I love the drink options and I love the food! Best selection of fresh salads and make your own salad. Pizza is delicious and the crust is perfect! Had my daughterâ€™s birthday party in their party room. The server was great and food was amazing.

name: Krista Snelling
text: Pizza was super fresh and delicious!  Service, fantastic!

name: Brenda Webb
text:
Great waiter, best hamburger ever, so big I could only eat half.
Great fun, and food.  I will eat their again when I get back to Owensboro,  Ky.  I hope I have the same waiter he was Awesome.

name: Michael Warren
text: Service slow, but experience pretty good overall.

name: Jennifer
text: One of my favorite places. The food is excellent, and the service is always great

name: James David Roberts
text: Great value on Happy Hour specials, especially apps. Try the stuffed meatballs! Not so much the pretzels.

name: Camden Byrd
text: I love the hummus, the spinach dip, and you can make your own pizza like you can get whatever you want on it. Mellow Mushroom is my most favorite place to eat at

name: JJ Sosh
text: Great ambience, exceptional customer service, super clean establishment....And The Sausagefest Calzone is unbelievably delicious!

name: Dale Payne
text: Friendly, attentive service! Wonderful experience!

name: Christopher Connell
text: Suggested some new drinks that weren't on the menu from another Mellow Mushroom. Ordered the Bees Knees and Kentucky Sunrise like I do at the Lexington location, the bartender Skyler made them better than I remember.

name: Kerry Young
text: We have been here a few times.  It is usually pretty busy... I actually have never had their pizza because the rest of the menu is that good!  The place always seems clean and staff is always smiling.   I love that they are using environmentally friendly straws now.    It is a little pricey.

name: Lisa Wellman
text: Food was great as usual once we got it!  The service was not great at all.  Had to keep asking for our food from whomever walked by.....others who came after us got their food first!  Very frustrating!   Have been here over an hour  already.

name: Jason Manning
text: I had a great time.  Everything was clean and sanitized.   The food and service was great.

name: Joshua Case
text: Placed an online to-go order and when I arrived it wasn't ready. Had to wait over 30 minutes longer than my requested pickup time. The manager walked by twice with other orders that were messed up. Don't waste your time. Go to a fast food pizza place that will get your order right.

name: Nick Hirsch
text: Delicious pizza. Wonderful atmosphere. Polite service. My water was never empty. Thank you for a wonderful night. We were there right up to close, never felt pressured to leave or hurried out the door before we finished our food. Appetizers, pizza and dessert brownies.

name: Isaiah Smith
text: Place is always amazing. They have fantastic pizza and customer service.

name: Vince Gudorf
text: Our pizzas were great and we had good service as well!!

name: Travis Powers
text: Great service and great food. The beer isn't bad either ðŸ‘

name: Alyce Fetterhoff
text: Lots of choices. They werenâ€™t super clear about gluten friendly items though. My gf pizza was over cooked and had so many toppings. I was just visiting the area, but I would go back and try again. People were nice.

name: Christine Drury-Hill
text: The food is to die for! The people who work there are awesome and a very comfy atmosphere.

name: Rachel Blanchard
text: Always good food and amazing drinks

name: Adam Paris
text: The atmosphere is cool and the pizza is great. Lots of menu items to choose from, fresh and organic ingredients used make a difference. Pretzel bites and beer cheese are amazing. Lots of beers to choose from if you're into that. Service can be a little slow during peak times, but it's worth the wait.

name: Kimberly Coin
text: The Food and service was FANTASTIC!  Our first time there and qe loved it!

name: Joseph Royal
text: Always love going here, great beer on tap and the pizza is real good, like the chill atmosphere

name: Joseph Piper
text: Good pizza at a good price, extremely friendly service.

name: James Edwards
text: Great service great food

name: Gamer Gamer
text: The service was perfect and me and my friend had the great time with some delicious meals. Will be eating here again!

name: Joe Pogue Jr
text: It was great. The teacher was good, in the waters was friendly.

name: Jared Porter
text: Pizza and beer were delicious

name: Wendy Kirtley
text: I got a Hoagie sandwich and it was really good. This isn't a fast food restaurant it did take a while to get our food.  The place was clean and the wait staff was very nice.

name: melissa renfro-brumley
text: Delicious delivery thru Big O delivery! Their calazone are huge and are so good!

name: RA Jones
text: It's new and clean and the food is good but it's new and clean and not the warmest cozy or inviting place one would like to spend extra time at. Seems like it's missing a lot of that hometown vibe that I look for when trying new spots to enjoy.

name: Steve Moutoux
text: Pizza was very delicious and staff was very courteous.

name: Suzanne Kremer
text: Great pizza.

name: Steven Weber
text: We loved the vibe. Good food good price..and Logan our waiter...was the cherry..,.no...olive on top!

name: Natalie Mayfield
text: Great service. Mediterranean salad was amazing.

name: Devin Bercegeay
text: Best pizza I've ever had in my life!!!!!

name: Zachary Masterson
text: Mellow Mushroom is my family's favorite pizza place.  Delicious food, welcoming staff, and an all around amazing atmosphere and psychedelic art make it a great place to hangout and get a bite to eat.

name: Russell Tiffany
text: Mellow mushroom is a pretty down to earth place. Relaxing and comfortable place to chill.

name: Olivia tha Swede
text: Great pizza great art 10/10

name: Brittany Stone
text: I'm happy to say that Mellow has improved in leaps and bounds from a few years ago. When you go in now, you can expect good food at a good price and good service to go right along with it.

name: Brian Basham
text: This is the best pizza in town, great staff

name: Cecil Burden
text: Loved it all the way Customer service and everything else

name: Foodie Traveler
text: Great food, great staff, and fun art!

name: Nicole Scimone
text: My admission is I like all pizza. I'll always take NJ/NY slices first, but this is my favorite chain. Grateful dead music and hippie vibe. There's a crisp outside, doughy inside crust which is very flavorful. Pesto swirl is my favorite â€¦More

name: Janet Perez
text: This is my favorite restaurant on second street love it so my style.

name: Jonathan Fowler
text: Wonderful atmosphere paired with delicious pizza at an affordable rate. Definitely a must have if you're in the area!

name: Walnut Street Apartments
text: We love mellow mushroom. Great service, always clean, tons of beer selections!

name: E H
text: Pizza was good staff was nice and polite. Definitely would go back. Next time though I'll get small medium is to much for one person .no complaints!!!!

name: Brett Harrison
text: Mellow mushroom serves some pretty good custom pies. The setting is very comfortable and the staff seems to be pretty friendly along with fast service. The meatballs serve as an excellent appetizer! If pizza isnt your thing they also have other options that go well.

name: Eddie Bittner
text: Love this place!! We are regulars. The best pizza in town and the staff is so friendly. If you see Eain working the bar, probably spelled that wrong, say hi and ask him for a beer suggestion. He really knows his beer.

name: David Petrie
text: Awesome pizza and great service!!

name: life n beta
text: I would have have mellow mushroom a higher rating if the service would have been good. We came in at 1:00 on a Sunday. We ordered only appetizers and a salad. After waiting 30 minutes we asked our server, why it was taking so long. The â€¦More

name: Brianna Taniges
text: I've been to this Mellow Mushroom a few times while in town for conferences, and have a great experience every time! I'm so thankful that there is an option for vegan cheese on the menu. Every server we have had there has been very nice and helpful, and overall is a great establishment!

name: Dennis Lancaster
text: We arrived about 4:00 p.m. on a Saturday evening. The restaurant itself is very nice. It has the downtown vibe of a much larger city. We were seated right away. There were large windows and we had a great view of downtown. We ordered the â€¦More

name: Nathan Walz
text: Great service, choices, serving size an atmosphere.

name: Geri Fox
text: Everytime i go there, they never disappoint!. The food is great as well as the atmosphere.

name: Andy Ward
text: This is a wonderful place to visit with a great variety of food. There to go worker, Dawson is especially accommodating and friendly

name: Dani Millay
text: Sitting at the bar is the place to be in my oppion, because service is always much faster. The staff at the bar are friendly and helpful. The food is very tasty and usually consistant. Its clean and bright atmosphere is wonderful in a cheers like bar setting.

name: Kourtnie Walker-Smalley
text: Food was great but our server Hannah was fantastic!

name: Anna West
text: Good food as always. We went for a meeting and didn't realize it was trivia night. So that was really loud and interrupted our meeting quite a bit. Next time we will call ahead to see if they have events going on.

name: Tracy OSRS
text: Ate the House special pizza here with my mom and a friend yesterday and oh my! It was so yummy!! Best pizza I have had in a long time.  The atmosphere is so classy and sheik.  Great place for a quick bite and to hang out with friends!

name: Jessica Schmitt
text: Amazing pizza and super nice staff

name: Cecil Dale
text: Very excellent place very professional customer service excellent best instincts on customer service I've ever seen

name: Dr. GrowBotNik
text: Love the menu and theme of it all. Way over priced though

name: Jenneci
text: I've gone there every Tuesday for about 2 months to participate in trivia night there, which I would highly recommend it's really fun and the categories are different each time with a good variety. Always playing really good music, Foods â€¦More

name: Teresa Ricketts
text: The service was fantastic. We sat in the bar and the bartender was quick to make recommendations that were spot on. The food was excellent. We will definitely be back.

name: Jaylin Thomasson
text: We waited 2 hours for a plan pepperoni pizza...... we got there before 3 other tables and they all ordered after us but ate, paid, and left before we revived our pizza. We also called ahead. The server was super sweet tho.

name: Nicholas Wagenbrenner
text: Never a bad decision! Besides the pizza being top notch, their wait staff is excellent. We've eaten here multiple times and have never left disappointed. They seem to be one of the very few pizza places that make dough that doesn't become a brick when cooled. Also try the spinach dip! Yum.

name: Shiloh Young
text: Not even worth 1 star. Service was the worst I have ever experienced! We had a group of 7 in the middle of what appeared to be a very slow afternoon for them. They didnâ€™t take our order for a very long time and we waited almost an hour for â€¦More

name: Karri Sahlhoff
text: We had the Mighty Meat pizza! The whole family loved it. Great service as well!

name: Jim Baker
text: Great pizza.  Great atmosphere.  Paper straws.

name: sam heartongue
text: The grapefruit nonalcoholic spritzer is flabberghastingly beautiful and delicious.

name: chris dukes
text: There dough and pizza is so amazing , great atmosphere as well !!

name: Ashley Jean
text: Pizza is delicious

name: Abby S
text: Excellent!!! Incredible service! Great food!

name: Big O
text: Great food, great service at the bar, happy hour specials were excellent. Thank you

name: Michael Aders
text: The food was better than good, but I'm not a pizza fan. The beer selection was great, and our waiter was extraordinarily nice, and stayed on top of things. Worth the hour drive from Evansville.

name: Dennis Jones
text: The pizza wad good but pricey.

name: Holly Noel
text: I got EXCEPTIONAL service from our server Mason! Will absolutely be back and will request him again!

name: Ebony Johnson
text: Pizza was amazing and so was the service

name: Dakota Kendall
text: Great pizza!

name: Marvin Guevara
text: Great food! Nice beer selection ðŸ‘Œ

name: Ed
text: Great pizza, outstanding sandwiches, vegan and vegetarian options. Lots of beer on tap. Great neighborhood style restaurant with a hip vibe and pleasant staff. Always and A+ experience.

name: Jade Vickery
text: This place is amazing! The prices are great and the staff is so nice always checking up on us. food only took about 10-15 minutes and it was sooo good. highly recommend!

name: Lacey Martinez
text: Salad greens and fixings were fresh! Great choice for kids and adults, I highly recommend the Great White! Service was friendly and fast!

name: Becky Chapman
text: Palmer was Great! Wonderful service and food!

name: Carol Hudgions
text: Pizza was very, very good. It handouts of toppings and baked perfectly. Pretzel bites were great too.

name: Chris Moody
text: Great pizza and friendly staff

name: Kim Hofman
text: The food was excellent our server Mel was great. We ordered a half Shitake and half Buffalo Chicken and Pretzel Bites. Will be returning

name: PRESTON PREECE
text: The food here is incredible.   I wasnt expecting it but the wings here might be some of the best in Owensboro.

name: Jamers McGee
text: Dig this place, I've been to the one in Lexington and this one keeps up. Last stopped in during the BBQ Fest and they had a great deal on beer. Love the decor and PBR on tap. Not sure if it's still around but they had the magical mystery tour pizza which was TOP NOTCH. Highly suggest this place as a chill pad with good pizza.

name: Wendy Reed
text: Expensive but really good food

name: john stephenson
text: Pizza was perfect. Kids meal was a good value. Service a bit lacking  but still a great experience overall.

name: Jim Hines
text: It was good but nothing stood out to me as being spectacular. The pretzel bites were very good as well as the cheesy garlic bread pizza. We had the Half & Half great white and how special pizzas. Like I said they were good but not â€¦More

name: Patrick Rykwalder
text: I had a lunch experience that makes me want to not come back to this restaurant.  We had ordered a simple lunch of salads and a side of meatballs.  We received the salads after what i would expect to call a long time after the very light â€¦More

name: Misty Ware
text: The pizza was great and the guys serving were so nice !!!

name: Jamaal Harris
text: Always a friendly and delicious experience. Cozy up to the bar and chow on a great pizza

name: Trickedout 900
text: Loved it. Great food, fun and artsy atmosphere.  Servers were friendly and pleasant.  If your in the area you should certainly stop in and check it out.

name: M for Murder
text:
The food was good. But the service we got by J. Booth
was absolutely terrible. She never followed up. It took her 15 minutes to get one Sprite for my stepson. She told my husband that she would get him a refill and â€¦More

name: Lisa Haynes
text: Great service,  and the bruschetta,  garlic knots, and California chicken club sandwich were all ah-mazing

name: dkparsley
text: Great place great service good times.

name: Steven Wilson
text: We ordered 3 pizzas. Two of them did not get made. It took almost 2 hours to get our full order. The server kept apologizing for the error but the manager never came to speak to us. The final insult came with the bill. They charged us full â€¦More

name: Julia Allen
text: love this place.  played trivia on Tuesday night and had a blast

name: Jimmylou Vandgrift
text: They always have great service and delicious food!!

name: Kathie Stafford
text: Love this place.  Great food, great drinks and excellent service

name: Cory Embry
text: Great restaurant with a great atmosphere, there can sometimes be a wait but is worth it.

name: Taniicka McBrien
text: Was 1st time trying a Mellow mushroom. I understand that pizza are handmade but having to wait over an hour for 2 pizzas was unnecessary. From where we sat I could see the kitchen, the kitchen staff could obviously see that it is busy so â€¦More

name: AS MAST
text: is a bit pricey, but the food and service were great

name: SAMANTHA STAMPER
text: Delicious pizza and I love the pretzel bites.

name: Russell Holliday
text: Great gluten free pizza and friendly chilled atmosphere

name: Gabriela Maynard
text: I must say that the service and the food were very good.

name: Heather Rand
text: The waitress was very attentive and very friendly and the food was amazing. If i search hard for something "negative" to say about our experience it would be only that the bacon on our pizza was a little over done which made it a little too â€¦More

name: Jenny Campbell
text: Great food, great atmosphere,  great service! Love this place! ðŸ’–

name: Michael Fezzey
text: Came from Michigan to take my kids to ROMP and stopped for a solo dinner. This was the absolute best pizza Iâ€™ve had. I got the MAUI pizza and I can tell you itâ€™s absolutely amazing. Great vibe and a good IPA to drink. Iâ€™d recommend this place with no hesitation. I will bring my kids here before we leave. Amazing pizza!

name: Ingrid Thompson
text: Love their pizza!!

name: Terri Wilkerson
text: Pizza was amazing .... and the wait staff were on top of everything .. in order to get a good pizza you do have to wait for it .... hand tossed crust ...fresh meat and veggies ... well worth the wait guys ... keep up the good work

name: Matt Mason
text: Waitress was good.  Took longer than I would like to get our food.   My hoagie bun was over cooked. But it was our first time there.  I will give it one more chance.

name: michael goss
text: The Calzone is gigantic and super delicious!

name: Robert Gant
text: Good service, pretty good food.  Not too bad of price.

name: Shanna Ballard
text: Our pizza was very good along with the Ceaser salad. We caught the timing right and made it to happy hour for their selections of beers. I would recommend Mellow Mushrooms to all.

name: David Hoekstra
text: Terrible service both times.  And charged for 3 iced tea refills?

name: John E T
text: If you like pizza, you know pizza. This pizza was ok, not the greatest but ok. The naked wings were excellent

name: Cody Bilbro
text: Good service and food

name: B Goodrich
text: Reliable and consistent.

name: Lauren Settles
text:
Server was great but we (2 adults and 4 hungry kids) waited over an hour for our pizza. The place was busy but not that crowded, no one waiting for a table.
The waiter told us they forgot our pizza in the back of the oven and it burnt. â€¦More

name: Karah Stokes
text: Great ingredients and they have gluten free pizza. The GF crust when I last visited was not made from scratch, though. Nice and reliable chain ðŸ• parlor. Selection of craft beer.

name: Tonya Painter
text:
Pizza was greasy, way too much bread, bland sauce, little amount of cheese :(
Prices were decent $ Parking difficult
Seating was a little uncomfortable, very close to eachother. Cool Decor.

name: Ronda Howard
text: Great food and service!

name: Marian Boockholdt
text: Great Food and Atmosphere!!! Service is great too!!!

name: Masonic Temple
text: Service was good, food was good but a little pricey.

name: BBN BBN
text: This is the closest Mellow Mushroom to me and it's worth the drive from Evansville. Staff is very friendly and the food has always been spot on. I would highly recommend.

name: Kyndal Davis
text: Best atmosphere and amazing food! Their service is impeccable.

name: ×™×•×—××™ ×’×¨×™× ×¤×œ×“
text: I had such a lovely experience ordering out. The bar tender was very friendly, the food was fantastic and prices so reasonable. I loved it!!

name: Sean Barnhill
text: Great service!  I liked that they didnt try to rush us out the door.. It was "mellow" but awesome!

name: Andre Thomas
text: Nice setup and beautiful presentation!

name: Anthony Shelley
text: Great pizza, great service, great vibes. Love 'murica.

name: Brian Young
text: Wow! Amazing place. Great service from the most awesome goatee I've ever seen, John.

name: kevin carroll
text: Good food took an hour for 2 salads

name: Larry Tierney
text: Food was good and price is reasonable

name: Millie Roberts
text: Absolutely amazing. And our server, Mason, was amazing as well. The food was awesome.

name: Norma Downen
text: Server very good & personable, pizza very good.

name: Andy Hickey
text: Excellent pizza

name: Kevin Russell
text: No comparison to their Bowling Green location. Like 2 different places

name: Sara Barnett
text: Most definitely going again! The crust on their pizza was excellent! Great service too!

name: Pamela Spurrier
text: Awesome as usual,  we love the Pizzas, and the pretzels emmmm. We love to dip our pretzels into the marinara sauce... my friend is Vegan and we love Mellow Mushroom because they offer Vegan cheese and other vegan items....

name: Diddy FourTweny
text: Great pizza, great service, great selection of beer.. what more can you want?

name: Steve Bartlett
text: Pizza is good,, but there hot wings need to be a little hotter....

name: Chris Findley
text: Great pizza, hefty calzones. Unfortunately, several citizens in Owensboro don't appreciate outside diners and try their best to annoy you with their vehicles. That immaturity aside, I recommend the food and staff 100%.

name: Lisa Wint
text: Awesome food an service. First time there an waiter was wonderful recommend foods to try.

name: Andrew Bringaze
text: Honestly the best pizza place around here for quite a ways... I enjoy everything about this place. The appetizers could be either a bit bigger or a bit cheaper though... but what do I know about running a restaurant. I will still come back often.

name: Nick DuMont
text: When I went to eat at the one in Louisville or basically anywhere it was great....for some reason to no surprise Owensboro and all its tweakers can't do food service right in this town!! I pay 50$ for two large pizzas and basically get 5$ â€¦More

name: Julie Crabtree
text: Holy Shitake mushroom pizza was my friend's top 3 pizzas of all time!

name: Doug Byers
text: Good food, really nice staff

name: John Phillips
text: Very good pizza. Op-art covering the walls. Had to be started by hippies! Good atmosphere. Highly recommend this pizzeria.

name: Ken Goatee
text:
Good food.
I recommend the Hey Dude Pizza.
And one of the many beers on tap of course!

name: Mike Horton
text: Really good. Food, and friendly service, definitely will go back!

name: Katie King
text: I would go back for the pretzels!! It did take a while to get our food. My boyfriend got a pizza and I got a sandwich. His pizza came out and he was done eating by the time I got my sandwich. And we were there when it wasnt even busy so I couldnt imagine what the wait would have been like if it were. Other then that it was good.

name: Pana Mona
text: One of the best places on town. I recommend it

name: Steven Bowen
text: Fantastic! Best one weâ€™ve been to. Late night on a Monday night right before close staff were friendly and helpful.

name: Kevin Crask
text: Love the atmosphere here, especially the bar. Wide selection of draft beer that changes often. Food is outstanding! Only reason I didn't 5 â˜† is because they are usually busy and service can be slow.

name: Steve Kreienkamp
text: Lindsey was a phenom behind the bar. She took great care of me!

name: Bill Stewart
text: Good atmosphere, friendly attentive service and good food. What more do you need...

name: Joe Murphy
text: Pizza was great.  Service was great.  Music...  sucked.  Why someone was playing non-stop jazz I have no idea. â€¦More

name: Chance Atherton
text: Great service. Good pizza. A little pricey, but good for every now and then.

name: DeeDee Hart
text: Located near riverfront, seated quickly, service outstanding, buffalo pizza exquisite and the crust oh my, cooked to perfection!

name: camjo105
text: Food was good, very cool decor, would rather they didn't seat families in the bar...my children heard some choice words I would rather they not be exposed to. Our server was FANTASTIC!

name: Thomas Hale
text: Ordered a pizza to go. The place was very busy, but turn around was quick. Pizza was outstanding! I'd come here often if I wasn't over 3 hours away.

name: Amy Jorgensen
text: The food was delicious and the service was great. The portions were also good for the price. We always enjoy visiting when we are in Owensboro. I would highly recommend it to anyone who loves pizza or calzones.

name: Stephanie Gray
text: Awesome as always

name: Anthony Richardson
text: Good pizza with interesting toppings

name: Daniel Pruden II
text: Food is great and prices are good.   Portions are a little big sometimes.  Atmosphere is outstanding and staff is friendly.

name: Bret Maynard
text: Cool place, great pizza and nice selection of beer!

name: Theodora Theodorou
text: Absolutely delicious food and service!! The atmosphere is amazing!!

name: Christopher Harris
text: Nice atmosphere friendly people good food

name: David Lutz
text: The pizza was excellent, but our waiter could have more attentive.

name: Kendra Harvey
text: Amazing food, amazing staff, all around just an amazing experience!

name: Kim Ziccardi

name: Jill Anderson
text: This restaurant is in a great location, just off the river in downtown Owensboro. I just went for beer, but this place is known for it's pizza, which I've yet to try. Their beer selection is quite impressive, though. I'd come here again to grab a drink and people watch.

text: Great food .. Great staff.. Atmosphere is great

name: George M. Haysler

name: Joshua Lipscomb
text: Great tour! Spirits are good but the tour makes it amazing.  Went here thinking it was the Sazarac Distillery, it is not. Very pleasantly surprised by tour and great service.  Their currwnt sprits are good and I look forward to their aged spirits as time progresses.

name: Brad Coyle

name: Andrew Houlne
text: The name suggests a relaxing environment, and this location met expectations.   This is a chain restaurant, but each location has its own character and decor. The food is good and as typical they have a decent selection of beer to go with the pizza and calzones.

name: Jeff Mcclure
text: Good pizza with a 60's atmosphere

text: Cheese bread was amazing! Pizza was an little dark on the bottom but still very good!

name: Wendy Wary
text: Went just before dinner rush, with no waiting to be seated. Either the waitress forgot to put my order in or the there was a mix-up in the kitchen. I had given myself 1.5 hours for dinner before I needed to be at a theater performance down â€¦More

name: Kyle AllMeister
text: Mason is awesome, actually everyone seemed cool, pizza was amazing. Great service, drink selection was on point! I made a great choice this night. Shiitake pizza ftw, try it is you haven't!

name: Erin Shannon
text: They have the Best Hummus! Oh, and their jerk chicken wings taste like authentic jamaican jerk. Sooooo good and totally on point! Great drink selection, and the atmosphere is fun and artsy.

text: Nice decoration, gentle service and great variety of plates. Hoagies, burguers and delicious pizza. The only reason I gave 4 out of 5, is because the wait was extensive, plus the burguer was burned. The server brought me another one, but it wasn't a worthy experience.

name: Michael Wilson

text: Server was outgoing and always refilling my drinks! The pizza was great as well. Only negative thing is the booths were on the small side. I thought this wasn't that big of an issue but a couple sat down next to us and had the same problem so they moved then that happened again. So i would recommend a table instead of booth when going!

name: Michelle Beck
text: We went in rather late. It was before closing time and they took the time to have conversation, and make recommendations even though it was so late. The pizza was stellar! I've been back three times within two weeks of the first visit! One of my favorite restaurants in the area!
